rukus.text: Suru karachi allahara name yini parama karunamaya, ati dayalu.
Yabatiya prasansa allaha ta'alara yini sakala srsti jagatera palanakarta.
Amara ekamatra tomara'i ibadata kari ebam sudhumatra tomara'i sahayya prarthana kari.
se samasta lokera patha, yaderake tumi neyamata dana karecha. Tadera patha naya, yadera prati tomara gajaba nayila hayeche ebam yara pathabhrasta hayeche.
